BasicInfo.short: Waiter.com provides online ordering and restaurant food delivery services for companies and homes in multiple U.S cities.

Products.name: WaiterMate
Products.description: WaiterMate features a variety of other features to simplify and streamline your ordering process.

Products.name: Virtual Cafe / Custom Cafe
Products.description: The ultimate solution for companies that need to feed their teams lunch or dinner on a regular basis. Variety. Time Savings. Boosted Morale.
